page.title: 08BUILDINGS IN MIDMAR
page.content: The old buildings used to be made of granite but now they are made with cement blocks.The old school beside my house is made with granite.It was built in 1896.There was another school beside the present one but it was knocked down when the present one was built.The old school beside my house was not needed any more so it became a garage.There are eight council houses in Midmar, two semi-detatched houses and four town houses.All the houses got in double glazing except numbers one and two because the houses were privately owned.Bethlin Farm is owned by Mr. Wharton of Midmar Castle who rents out the farm.There have been seven new houses built in Glenwood Park.They are very big and have large gardens.Some steadings have been converted into houses.
